name: The Goodnight Potion
description:
**Submission for Mini Jam 103: Darkness**

The goodnight potion is about an old wizard, now too old to cast the simplest spells, who has the habit of drinking a potion or two before going to sleep.  

 

Scroll through the levels trying to drink as much as you can while racking up score and not dying atrociously.

Each level contains different potions that can cause different effects. So why don't you start trying one?

*Old age will not defeat this wizard*

 

Authors: Marco Massa- Federico Bachis

*The game and assets were produced at the time of the jam*

Worktime: 16 hours.
